name: Mareep
flavorText:
If static elec­
tricity builds in
its body, its fleece doubles in
volume. Touching
it will shock you.

previous.name: Xatu
previous.flavorText:
They say that it
stays still and
quiet because it is seeing both the
past and future at
the same time.

next.name: Flaaffy
next.flavorText:
As a result of
storing too much
electricity, it developed patches
where even downy
wool won't grow.

pokemon.name: Ampharos
pokemon.flavorText:
The tail's tip
shines brightly
and can be seen from far away. It
acts as a beacon
for lost people.
